summary: Build a dedicated admin page login gate using a hard-coded passkey (vEDANSH468), required once per session, while keeping the existing admin page UI unchanged.
architectural_notes: Admin authentication is a single hard-coded passkey (vEDANSH468), validated once per session, gating access to the existing admin page without changing its UI.
known_issues: Current passkey flow fails during passkey entry for admin login (Version 21).

existing_features.title: Rebuild the /admin/login flow to be passkey-only (no Internet Identity login) using the hard-coded passkey "vEDANSH468", and unlock admin access once per browser session via the existing sessionStorage-based admin session mechanism.

Update admin route protection to rely only on the admin session unlock state (sessionStorage) and redirect unauthenticated admin sessions to /admin/login, while keeping all admin dashboard pages and layout unchanged.

Refactor the admin passkey verification logic to remove the Internet Identity dependency from the passkey verification hook and ensure consistent session unlock/clear behavior (unlock on success; clear on any failure).

new_feature_requests.summary: Rebuild admin login using hard-coded passkey "vEDANSH468" on a dedicated admin page; require passkey once per session; keep existing admin page UI unchanged

projectName: Fix failing admin passkey by rebuilding dedicated passkey-only admin login (once per session) without changing admin dashboard UI
